Erasmus Blog

My internship abroad in Estonia

Arrival in Estonia

Finally the day arrvied, everything is packed, I arrive early enough, a last goodbye to my loved ones and...
My flight has a delay.
But after listening to some music for a couple thirty more minutes, the plane is ready to be boarded.

After two further hours I left my homeland 1000km behind me and stand now in Estonia's capital.
I try not to waste too much time, after all it is 20:00 o'clock and Kairi, the person responsible for me during my time in Estonia, is waiting for me outside.
She greets me warmly and in the car we talk about the city, pending matters for me and my German roomate Stephan and further plans for the week.

After we arrive at the apartment and Stephan and me greet each other we are left alone.
Pressed by hunger and curiosity I am eager to leave the apartment and go on a small expedition in the old town.


Regarding my apartment
